Class CameraCanvas

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Canvas
          uk.co.dancowan.robots.srv.ui.views.camera.CameraCanvas
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, CameraImageConsumer<java.awt.Component>
public class CameraCanvas
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements CameraImageConsumer<java.awt.Component>

Extension of the AWT Canvas class to display images streamed from the SRV1q

Since:
version 1.0.0
Author:
Dan Cowan

setDisplaySize

public void setDisplaySize(int width,
                           int height)
Set the max image display size.

Respects the aspect ratio of the image to display.

Parameters:
width - the pixel width of the receiver
height - the pixel height of the receiver

Receive a new Image from the FrameDecoder, scale buffer as necessary and paint the incoming image to the buffer.

Parameters:

Returns:

paint

public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
Implementation of java.awt.Canvas.paint(Graphics)

Paints the internal image buffer to the AWT Canvas instance.

Contributed OverlayContributor classes are queried and allowed to paint as necessary.

Overrides:
paint in class java.awt.Canvas
Parameters:
g - the Graphics context

setZoom

public void setZoom(boolean zoom)
Enable zoom mode.

Parameters:
zoom - boolean, true to zoom, false for standard image
